summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's nourishing, rich moisture Plant Ceramide Rich Moisture Cream is formulated with plant-derived ceramides, that help restore and support skin’s natural moisture barrier to relieve dry, dull skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsLuxurious, rich ceramide moisturizer infuses the skin with intense hydration to help support the lipid barrierFormulated with an efficacious level of plant-derived ceramidesNaturally protected by a phospholipid layer, these help restore and strengthen the natural moisture barrier to relieve dry skinDermatologist testedFragrance freeVegan, paraben & cruelty freeKey IngredientsPlant Ceramides: helps strengthen the natural moisture barrier, protects & replenish skin, and works to improve textureGlycerin: restores skin by drawing & locking in moisture, deeply hydrates & soothesand works to maintain supple & youthful-looking skinShea Butter: rich in fatty acids, provides hydration for soft, conditioned, & nourished skin and works to target dryness & dullnessPlant-Derived Squalane: helps restore the proper balance of natural oils, works to leave skin feeling suppleand adds weightless hydrationResearch ResultsCLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS*100% of subjects showed improvement in the look of fine lines & wrinkles in 4 weeks*100% of subjects showed improvement in hydration immediately*88% of subjects showed firmer skin in 8 weeks**In an 8-week clinical study on subjects (women & men), representation across all skin types & self-perceived sensitive skinItem 2627356How To UseUsing upward motions, massage gently onto face, neck and chest. For best results, layer after serums morning and night.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Behenyl Alcohol, C12-16 Alcohols, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Decyl Esters, Isostearyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane, Butylene Glycol Cocoate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Palmitic Acid, Phospholipids, Sphingolipids, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Squalane, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Citric Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylcellulose, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Phytate, Potassium Sorbate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Citrate.
how_to_use: Using upward motions, massage gently onto face, neck and chest. For best results, layer after serums morning and night.For external use only. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Me and my BF love it
reviews.comments: Suitable for various skin types, I have dry, my BF is more oily and this has been great for both of us.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments:
I am 68 & have dry/combination skin. This cream is very plumping & moisturizing, though I do usually add a small amount of moisturizer over it, once it's absorbed. It doesn't take much product. I've noticed it doesn't seem great with my makeup (maybe I need to do very, very little). I usually use on a non-makeup day & every night. I do like this product & definitely recommend it.
I didn't care for the Tranexemic Acid (did next to nothing for my mylasma & dark spots, nor did I like the Vitamin C product). That said, they may work better for some people. Just didn't do anything for me.

reviews.headline: Plant ceramide moisturizer
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this but it didnt work out. I liked how thick but it just sat on top of my skin. It didnt sink in and allow my skin to absorb it if that makes sense. And when applying it would start to roll off like it didnt mix well with my other products that i applied first.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments:
I'm 67 years old & I find that this cream, which has a nice, luxuriant feel - is fabulous. It
adds a nice plumping while adding moisture to my skin. I do also add a small amount of CeraVe Revitalizing Night Cream, as I often need additional moisture. 
I think this product is very good & improves my skin. It doesn't cause my skin to breakout & I can definitely still get those from some products.
I am not fond of the Naturium Tranexemic Acid (did next to nothing for my Mylasma & Hyperpigmentation). I also didn't think the Vitamin C worked well for me.

reviews.headline: Saved my acne prone skin (for real)
reviews.comments:
As an acne girly of 10+ years I've struggled in the skincare game. BUT this moisturizer is the first one I've used that never breaks me out and leaves my skin glowing. 

I use it AM & PM.

Worth a try!

reviews.headline: Saved my acne prone skin (for real)
reviews.comments:
As an acne girly of 10+ years I've struggled in the skincare game. BUT this moisturizer is the first one I've used that never breaks me out and leaves my skin glowing. 

I use it AM & PM.

Worth a try!

reviews.headline: Not good for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I had to return this product after trying to for a week. The biggest con of this product is the irritation. I have sensitive dry skin and this moisturizer wasnt really soothing. The texture was more like a balm rather than a cream, making it feel more emollient rather than hydrating. This product is also marketed as fragrance free, however, it had a eucalyptus-like scent. Overall, I think there are better thick moisturizers out there.

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: I like many other naturium products but this one isn't for me. I don't think it's good for acne prone skin. It's greasy and weirdly not the most moisturizing.

reviews.headline: To thick
reviews.comments: This moisture is way to thick and oily for me my face was so shiny all day long and when I would put makeup it would even so thick. Definitely not for me. If you have combination skin I would say don't get it. But if it didn't work for me, doesn't meant it wouldn't for you :)

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Its a nice thick face moisturizer. I use it at night and feels and looks great. Hydrating and last all night.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Its a nice thick face moisturizer. I use it at night and feels and looks great. Hydrating and last all night.

reviews.headline: Nice cream BUT the scent.
reviews.comments: It has a really nice feel but the natural scent of this product smells like a hint menthol mixed with rubber tires. The only reason I returned it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product doesn't bother my allergies.  It's a semi rich face cream for day and nighttime routine for  more mature and/or dryer skin type.I find it absorbs quickly on to the face,however, I find that I still have to use a Rose,Squalane or marula oil at night after applying this cream. My morning routine,  I use a peptide serum,then this product and sunscreen.  It works nicely and it's affordable!

reviews.headline: Rich but not occlusive
reviews.comments: Works great as a night moisturizer, over trentinoin. Rich texture but not occlusive. Good for combo-dry acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: Love this line!
reviews.comments: I always thought i had to spend a lot of money to get good skin care. Not so! I love all the Naturium skin care. It is amazing! I have been using only a short time and already notice improvements. Love love love this line!

reviews.headline: Works but leaves bumps on face
reviews.comments: Works but leaves bumps on face

reviews.headline: Amazing Moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I received this as a sample and promptly ordered the largest dize I could! This rich mousturizer is perfect for my combination skin….really soothes dryness and is not yo heavy for oily spots. Feels like it balances my skin. And no fragrance so not irritating. I will never be eithout this!

media.headline: Absolutely amazing ceramide cream for combo skin
media.caption: Comparison between ceramide cream and night cream

media.headline: Absolutely amazing ceramide cream for combo skin
media.caption: Buttery ceremide heaven

faceoff_positive.comments: I don't like cerave but was looking for a good ceramide cream. This is light in texture but rich. I apply to damp skin and it melts in like butter. You only need a small amount. I have combo skin that can be oily but using this as my night cream is amazing. No scent, no irritation or breakouts and no oiliness the next morning. Perfect for after retinol or exfoliating
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolutely amazing ceramide cream for combo skin

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received this as a sample, and I see several reviews for that time frame.... So I'm here to be honest. 

If you have acne issues even a little, do not use. 

I do not have acne prone skin and this broke me out every night that I put it on. I woke up to a new spot. It is slightly greasy and just a little tuff to rub around skin because it is thicker than most moisturizers. It also has a really unpleasant smell like rubber tires. The smell lasts for a couple hours. 2 stars because it is very hydrating but that's if you are willing to trade that for acne and the unpleasant smell
faceoff_negative.headline: Hydrates but greasy
